import re

def candidate(s):
    # Define the regex pattern that matches words at least 4 characters long
    pattern = r'\b\w{4,}\b'
    
    # Find all matches of the pattern in the string
    matches = re.findall(pattern, s)
    
    # Return the list of matched words
    return matches
